mapper.sql: FI_ID, FS_ORDER_ID, FI_SEQ, to_char(FT_CREATDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') as FT_CREATDATE, FI_TYPE, FS_CONTACTNAME, FS_CONTACTTEL, FI_TOTAL, FI_OLDER, FI_ADULT, FI_CHILDREN, FS_POSTSCRIPT, FD_AMT, FI_STAT

mapper.insert: insert into TORDERCUSTOM (FI_ID, FS_ORDER_ID, FI_SEQ, FT_CREATDATE, FI_TYPE, FS_CONTACTNAME, FS_CONTACTTEL, FI_TOTAL, FI_OLDER, FI_ADULT, FI_CHILDREN, FS_POSTSCRIPT, FD_AMT, FI_STAT, FC_RESSNAPSHOT, FC_FUZZYSNAPSHOT) values (#{fiId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fsOrderId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fiSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ftCreatdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fiType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fsContactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsContacttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fiTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fiOlder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fiAdult,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fiChildren,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fsPostscript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fiStat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcRessnapshot,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{fcFuzzysnapshot,jdbcType=CLOB})

update TORDERCUSTOM
FI_ID = #{record.fiId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FS_ORDER_ID = #{record.fsOrderId,jdbcType=CHAR},
FI_SEQ = #{record.fiSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FT_CREATDATE = to_date(#{record.ftCreatdate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),
FI_TYPE = #{record.fiType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FS_CONTACTNAME = #{record.fsContactname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_CONTACTTEL = #{record.fsContacttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FI_STAT = #{record.fiStat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FC_RESSNAPSHOT = #{record.fcRessnapshot,jdbcType=CLOB},
FC_FUZZYSNAPSHOT = #{record.fcFuzzysnapshot,jdbcType=CLOB},
